articles.description: The US Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) has approved the use of the Moderna COVID-19 vaccine by pilots and air traffic controllers.
articles.content:
The US Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) has approved the use of the Moderna COVID-19 vaccine by pilots and air traffic controllers.
The Saturday announcement follows the FAA's December 12 appro… [+1268 chars]
